flawed_nl_solution:
The total distance of the trip is 420 + 273 = <<420+273=693>>693 miles.
To make the trip Andy must drive 693 miles / 11 hours = <<693/11=36>>36 miles per hour.
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 36. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
